* Computation Mathematical Expressions:

The Babylonian (Heronâ€™s) method for $\sqrt{2}$ uses the recurrence

$$
x_{n+1} = \frac{1}{2}\left(x_n + \frac{2}{x_n}\right), \qquad x_0>0.
$$

A common choice is $x_0=1$, giving the sequence
$$
1,; 1.5,; 1.416666\ldots,; 1.414215686\ldots,; 1.41421356237\ldots ;\to; \sqrt{2}.
$$
